goals__remit: Snap, Inc. is a camera company.  Our products empower people to express themselves through the camera. Snapchat is about communicating with friends and family, living in the moment, learning about the world, and having fun together. Spectacles are connected glasses that allow users to share their memories on Snapchat more easily.
